en.undefendedAppStatusMsg: You can continue with your divorce
en.undefendedButNotAdmit: Your {{ divorceWho }} has responded to your application and said that they don’t intend to defend the divorce (they won’t try to prevent it), but doesn’t accept the allegations made in the application.
en.undefendedAmendedCaseButNotAdmit: Your {{ divorceWho }} has responded to your amended application and said that they don’t intend to defend the divorce (they won’t try to prevent it), but doesn’t accept the allegations made in the application.
en.undefendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: Your {{ divorceWho }} has responded to your application and said that they don’t intend to defend the divorce (they won’t try to prevent it).
en.undefendedAmendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: Your {{ divorceWho }} has responded to your amended application and said that they don’t intend to defend the divorce (they won’t try to prevent it).
en.undefendedAppStatusMsgDetails2: You can now continue with the next stage and apply for your decree nisi.
en.undefendedReadMore: Read more about the decree nisi
en.undefendedOrderForDivorce: The court order for divorce (known as a decree) is made in 2 stages. You’re only divorced once both stages are complete.
en.undefendedCourtAgrees: The 'decree nisi', which shows that the court agrees that you’re entitled to a divorce.
en.undefendedCannotBeMade6Weeks: The ‘decree absolute’, which legally ends the marriage. It cannot be made until at least 6 weeks after the decree nisi.
en.undefendedUntilTheDecreeAbsolute: The court can cancel (legally known as rescind) the decree nisi at any time up until the decree absolute, if it’s presented with new evidence showing why you shouldn’t be given a divorce.

cy.undefendedButNotAdmit: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi ymateb i’ch cais ac maent wedi datgan nad ydynt yn bwriadu amddiffyn yr ysgariad (ni fyddant yn ceisio ei atal), ond nid ydynt yn derbyn yr honiadau a wnaed yn y cais.
cy.undefendedAmendedCaseButNotAdmit: Mae eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi ymateb i’ch cais diwygiedig ac maent wedi datgan nad ydynt yn bwriadu amddiffyn yr ysgariad (ni fyddant yn ceisio ei atal), ond nid ydynt yn derbyn yr honiadau a wnaed yn y cais.

cy.undefendedAppStatusMsgDetails2: Gallwch nawr barhau â’r cam nesaf a gwneud cais am eich Dyfarniad Nisi.
cy.undefendedReadMore: Darllen mwy am y Dyfarniad Nisi
cy.undefendedOrderForDivorce: Mae 2 gam i'r gorchymyn llys am ysgariad (a elwir yn ‘dyfarniad’). Dim ond pan fydd y ddau gam wedi’u cwblhau y byddwch wedi ysgaru.
cy.undefendedCourtAgrees: Y ‘Dyfarniad Nisi’, yw’r ddogfen a gewch gan y llys pan fydd yn cytuno bod gennych hawl i gael ysgariad.
cy.undefendedCannotBeMade6Weeks: Y ‘Dyfarniad Absoliwt’, sy’n dod â’r briodas i ben yn gyfreithiol. Ni ellir ei roi tan o leiaf 6 wythnos ar ôl y Dyfarniad Nisi.
cy.undefendedUntilTheDecreeAbsolute: Gall y llys ganslo (a elwir yn gyfreithiol yn ‘dadwneud’) y Datganiad Nisi unrhyw bryd hyd at adeg cyflwyno’r Dyfarniad Absoliwt, os bydd yn cael tystiolaeth newydd yn dangos pam na ddylech gael ysgariad.
